title: [命令方块]刷怪笼指令
author: 冰柠檬汁
txt_content: 求一个setblock的刷怪笼指令：｛生成[僵尸]，NBT：[头上戴钻石块，穿一件锁链胸甲[附魔保护1，耐久1],主手拿木剑[自定义属性：伤害+2.5，附魔：耐久1]，副手拿爆裂紫颂果，掉落几率：钻石块（0%），锁链胸甲（30%），木剑（60%），爆裂紫颂果（90%）]，一次生成3只，刷怪半径：7，搜索到半径14格内有玩家开始刷怪，基础间隔5s，最大间隔6.5s，最小间隔3.5s，区域内最多有20只｝1.10.2版本

replies.author: 爱心魔王FHC
replies.txt_content:
冰柠檬汁 发表于 2017-4-2 22:05
报告FHC红石，{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2.5,AttributeName:gen ...
抱歉没测试= =现在可以了
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:7,RequiredPlayerRange:14,Delay:100,MinSpawnDelay:130,MaxSpawnDelay:70,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnData:{id:Zombie,ArmorItems:[0:{},1:{},2:{id:"minecraft:chainmail_chestplate",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:0,lvl:1},{id:34,lvl:1}]}},3:{id:minecraft:diamond_block,Count:1}],HandItems:[0:{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:34,lvl:1}],AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2.5,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack,Slot:"mainhand"}]}},1:{id:"chorus_fruit_popped",Count:1}],HandDropChances:[0:0.6f,1:0.9f],ArmorDropChances:[0:0.0f,1:0.0f,2:0.3f,3:0.0f]}}

replies.author: 冰柠檬汁
replies.txt_content:
FHC红石 发表于 2017-4-2 21:38
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ minecraft:mob_spawner 0 replace 
{SpawnCount:3,SpawnRange:7,RequiredPlayerRange:14, ...
报告FHC红石，{AttributeModifiers:[{Operation:0,UUIDLeast:1,UUIDMost:1,Amount:2.5,AttributeName:generic.attackDamage,Name:Attack}]}}}该段在命令方块里执行失败！

replies.author: Java_command
replies.txt_content:
这样吧：
/setblock ~ ~1 ~ mob_spawner 0 replace {SpawnCount:3,MaxNearbyEntities:20,SpawnRange:7,Delay:100,MinSpawnDelay:100,MaxSpawnDelay:120,RequiredPlayerRange:14,SpawnData:{id:Zombie,HandItems:[{id:"minecraft:wooden_sword",Count:1,tag:{ench:[{id:34,lvl:3}]}},{id:"minecraft:chorus_fruit_popped",Count:1}],HandDropChances:[0.6F,0.9F],ArmorItems:[{},{},{Count:1,id:"minecraft:chainmail_chestplate"},{id:"minecraft:diamond_block"}],ArmorDropChances:[0F,0F,0.3F,0F]}}复制代码

生成器可以做到的事情我不推荐你来这里问。
